verbs.description: On day 500 of [ARG1: his term of office] , [R-ARG1: which] [V: fell] [ARGM-TMP: on June 4] , Mr Trump 's approval rating among Republicans stood at 87 per cent , according to Gallup , with only George W. Bush polling higher since World War II .

On day 500 of his term of office , which fell on June 4 , Mr Trump 's approval rating among Republicans stood at 87 per cent , [V: according] to Gallup , with only George W. Bush polling higher since World War II .
